participants.header_explain: Name all participants, including those who did'nt financially contribute.
participants.name: Name

expenses.header_explain: Input all expenses. Expenses not shared with all participants should be marked as 'Side Pot' and shared participants must be selected.

break-even.header_explain: Expenses summary and break-even chart. who need to pay who and how much
break-even.msg_copied: Summary and chart was copied as text to clipboard, paste it wherever you like.
